item.title: Liquid AI’s new STAR model architecture outshines Transformer efficiency
item.description: The STAR framework leverages evolutionary algorithms and a numerical encoding system to balance quality and efficiency in AI models.

item.title: Hume launches Voice Control allowing users and developers to make custom AI voices
item.description: Hume focuses on providing tools for creating unique, expressive voices that align with user needs, such as customer service chatbots.

item.title: Nous Research is training an AI model using machines distributed across the internet
item.description: Nous's DisTrO, Distributed Training Over-the-Internet, allows foundation class models to be trained without expensive superclusters.

item.title: Cohere’s Rerank 3.5 is here, and it’s about to change enterprise search forever
item.description: Cohere's new Rerank 3.5 AI search model processes queries in 100+ languages and improves enterprise search accuracy by 30%, revolutionizing how global...

item.title: Enterprise AI gets closer to data with Couchbase’s new Capella AI services
